college.title: The College Era
college.description: I attended college at Johnson & Wales University in Providence, Rhode Island on a student business organization (FBLA-PBL) scholarship. I studied Entrepreneurship with a minor in Sociology.

omnyist.title: The Omnyist Era
omnyist.description: "Omnyist" is a term I coined to represent the lump sum of all of my hobbies. It encompasses my growing interest in the makerspace: including 3D printing, and micro-electronics.

streaming.title: The Streaming Era
streaming.description: Twitch introduced me to the world of live streaming and after my time at Twitch had come to an end, I decided to take the plunge and stream full-time.

web-design.title: The Web Design Era
web-design.description: From freelancer to agency founder, these were the years of pixel-perfect PSDs, CSS Zen Garden submissions, and designing for the new social web.
